Accordion.description: Contains all the parts of an accordion.

props.name: asChild
props.description: When true, changes the rendered element to the one passed as a child, merging their props.

props.name: type
props.description: Determines whether one (single) or multiple (multiple) items can be opened at once.

props.name: value
props.description: Controlled value of the opened item when type=single. Must be used with onValueChange.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: Initial open item value when rendered and type=single, for uncontrolled usage.

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Callback when expanded state of item changes (type=single).

props.name: value
props.description: Controlled values of opened items when type=multiple. Must be used with onValueChange.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: Initial array of opened items when rendered and type=multiple, for uncontrolled usage.

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Callback when expanded state of items changes (type=multiple).

props.name: collapsible
props.description: When type=single, allows all items to be closed by clicking the open item again.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When true, prevents user interaction with the entire accordion.

props.name: dir
props.description: Reading direction. If omitted, assumes LTR.

props.name: orientation
props.description: The orientation of the accordion.

AccordionItem.description: Contains all the parts of a collapsible section.

props.name: asChild
props.description: When true, changes the rendered element to the one passed as a child, merging their props.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with this item.

props.name: value
props.description: A unique string value that identifies the item.

AccordionHeader.description: Wraps an Accordion.Trigger. Typically a heading element.

props.name: asChild
props.description: When true, changes the rendered element to the one passed as a child, merging their props.

AccordionTrigger.description: Toggles the collapsed state of its associated item.

props.name: asChild
props.description: When true, changes the rendered element to the one passed as a child, merging their props.

AccordionContent.description: Contains the collapsible content for an item.

props.name: asChild
props.description: When true, changes the rendered element to the one passed as a child, merging their props.

props.name: forceMount
props.description: Forces the content to remain mounted when closed, useful for animations.

cssVariables.name: --radix-accordion-content-width
cssVariables.description: The width of the content when it opens/closes.

cssVariables.name: --radix-accordion-content-height
cssVariables.description: The height of the content when it opens/closes.

AlertDialog.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.

props.name: defaultOpen
props.description: The open state of the dialog when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

props.name: open
props.description: The controlled open state of the dialog. Must be used in conjunction with onOpenChange.

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Event handler called when the open state of the dialog changes.

AlertDialogTrigger.description: A button that opens the dialog.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props.

AlertDialogPortal.description: Portals the overlay and content into the body by default.

props.name: forceMount
props.description: Forces mounting when more control is needed, useful for controlling animations.

props.name: container
props.description: Specify a container element to portal the content into.

AlertDialogOverlay.description: A layer that covers the inert portion of the view when the dialog is open.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props.

props.name: forceMount
props.description: Forces mounting when more control is needed. Inherits from AlertDialog.Portal.

AlertDialogContent.description: Contains content to be rendered when the dialog is open.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props.

props.name: forceMount
props.description: Forces mounting when more control is needed. Inherits from AlertDialog.Portal.

props.name: onOpenAutoFocus
props.description: Called when focus moves to the destructive action after opening. Can prevent by event.preventDefault.

props.name: onCloseAutoFocus
props.description: Called when focus moves to the trigger after closing. Can prevent by event.preventDefault.

props.name: onEscapeKeyDown
props.description: Called when the escape key is pressed. Can prevent by event.preventDefault.

AlertDialogCancel.description: A button that closes the dialog, visually distinct from AlertDialog.Action.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props.

AlertDialogAction.description: A button that closes the dialog, visually distinct from AlertDialog.Cancel.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props.

AlertDialogTitle.description: An accessible name announced when the dialog is opened.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props.

AlertDialogDescription.description: An accessible description announced when the dialog is opened.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props.

AspectRatio.description: Displays content within a desired ratio.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props.

props.name: ratio
props.description: The desired ratio for the content.
